WELCOME.HEADING: Get Access With
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: OpenPass is an independent service that secures your data. It allows you to control and personalize your advertising experience on {{websiteName}} with your explicit permission.

OPEN_PASS_PROS.INFORMATION: You will support online businesses that provide you with tailored content.

SUMMARY.TITLE: How does OpenPass work?
SUMMARY.DESCRIPTION: With your permission, OpenPass converts your email address into a pseudonymous identifier. This identifier is shared with trusted advertising partners who use it to show you advertisements that they think are relevant to you. Learn more
